Body: Description: Issue: According to the EPP client settings, the client is not connected to the server and has no policies received. --> see screenshot "EPP_Client_settings_LPTP2045733.jpg" attached. Analysis: - Test connection from client to server was successful. --> see screenshot "tnc_connection_test_LPTP2045733.jpg" attached. - According to the server logs, client received policies. --> see screenshot "EPP_server_logs_LPTP2045733.jpg" attached. Questions: - How do these two points fit together? - What is the actual status, has the client received the latest policy? Log file has been attached to the website: LPTP2045733.zip Expectation: Please check, analyze and clarify this behavior and questions. Thank you.
